statements: SELECT * FROM player_distances;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_distances;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM player_distances;
SELECT * FROM player_distances ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_location FROM player_distances WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_location FROM player_distances;
SELECT player_name, player_id, player_location FROM player_distances WHERE player_id = '1234';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_distances WHERE ST_DWithin(player_location, 'POINT(-71.064544 42.28787)', 100);
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM player_distances ORDER BY player_name ASC, player_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_distances WHERE player_id = '5678';
SELECT * FROM Players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name FROM Players WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM Players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Distances WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT player_id, player1_id, player2_id, distance FROM Distances ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM Players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name FROM Players WHERE ST_Distance(player_location, ST_GeomFromText('POINT(0 0)')) < 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, ST_AsText(player_location) AS location FROM Players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, distance FROM Players LEFT JOIN Distances ON Players.player_id = Distances.player1_id WHERE distance > 50;
SELECT player_id AS id, player_name AS name, ST_X(player_location) AS longitude, ST_Y(player_location) AS latitude FROM Players;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_location FROM players WHERE player_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, player_location, item_name FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_location, distance FROM players JOIN player_distances ON players.player_id = player_distances.player_id1 WHERE player_id1 = 3 AND player_id2 = 4;

SELECT player_name, player_location, item_name, distance FROM (players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id) JOIN player_distances ON players.player_id = player_distances.player_id1 WHERE player_id1 = 1;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM Players;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM Players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM Players WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player1_id, player2_id, distance FROM PlayerDistances WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT * FROM Players ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_location FROM Players WHERE player_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_name, distance FROM Players JOIN PlayerDistances ON Players.player_id = PlayerDistances.player1_id WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT player_name AS 'Player Name', interaction_type AS 'Type', interaction_time AS 'Interaction Time' FROM Players JOIN PlayerInteractions ON Players.player_id = PlayerInteractions.player1_id;

SELECT player_name, player_location, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM Players JOIN PlayerInteractions ON Players.player_id = PlayerInteractions.player1_id JOIN PlayerFriends ON Players.player_id = PlayerFriends.player1_id WHERE interaction_type = 'message';
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM Player ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM Item WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT player_id, player_location FROM Player WHERE player_location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM PlayerInventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_items > 5;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Player
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_description FROM Item
SELECT log_id, timestamp, interaction_type FROM InteractionLog
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_location FROM Player
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM Item
